content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello, Mr. Trabelsi. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your budget for a monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. I'm looking for a place that I can call home for the next few years. As a student, I'm on a tight budget, so I'm hoping to find the best deal possible. I'm willing to pay up to 1200 Euros per month for the right apartment. Would this price be acceptable for your place?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Your budget of 1200 Euros per month is quite reasonable for an apartment of this size in the area. However, I'm looking to maximize the return on my investment. Is there any wiggle room in your budget? Perhaps we can find a price that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your position, Mr. Heine. As a student, I'm quite dependent on finding a place that fits within my budget. While I would like to pay less, I'm willing to stretch my budget a bit if it means getting a good deal. Let's say I can go up to 1250 Euros per month if the apartment meets my needs. Is there anything else you can offer to make the deal more attractive?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Your willingness to pay 1250 Euros per month is quite generous, especially considering the size of the apartment. However, I'm still looking to achieve a higher rental price. Would you be willing to pay a bit more, say 1300 Euros per month, to secure this apartment? In return, I can offer you a longer lease term if you're interested.
name: Heinrich Heine
